On a Wednesday

A lot of people work during the day. A lot of people don't.

What the hell are all of these people doing?

Michelle, enjoying her Wednesday.

I'm trying to find that out. Along with Bekka Palmer, I'm asking strangers about their Wednesdays, snapping a photo and putting it on a website.

A project of pure curiosity, On a Wednesday has already gotten me up early on Wednesdays and exploring a few new neighborhoods in NYC.

I'm really looking forward to growing this series over the next few months. Already, we're adapting the questions we ask and how they're being published.

I'd love to hear any feedback if you have it. Anything you want to me to ask?

Robert, on his break from work.

August 09, 2013
